beta.answer: We are currently targeting for March 2021! Subscribe to the newsletter for further information!
beta.question: When will you begin beta testing?

open.answer: Yes, we are planning our core offering to be fully open source. We heavily support and believe in open source for the future of the world.
open.question: Will Sentrei be open source?

usage.answer: Absolutely! We are currently planning to be completely free forever for all personal use-cases.
usage.question: Will there be a plan for personal use?

section.subtitle: Feel free to ask us about anything!
section.title: Frequently Asked Questions

analytics.description: Get insight on what you use. Built-in analytics features on the backend.
analytics.title: Dedicated analytics

authentication.description: Make use of built-in authentication system that integrates seamlessly with the underlying backend infrastructure.
authentication.title: Built-in authentication

database.description: We are powered by a cross region sub-second scalable database with automatic failure recovery.
database.title: Distributed database

fast.description: We are obsessed with performance, for both the customer and developer.
fast.title: Blazing fast

fee.description: You only pay for what you use. We also provide a generous free tier for all developers to try out.
fee.title: No hidden fees

scale.description: Think globally from the start. Never worry about the underlying infrastructure. We take care of the rest.
scale.title: Scale infinitely

section.subtitle: Don't compromise on either developer experience or real-world performance. We are powered by the blazing edge technology.
section.title: Blazing fast at scale

description.1: Sentrei provides the edge serverless backend on top of the global database infrastructure.
description.2: We abstract away the boilerplate to provide the best developer experience.
description.3: We aim to do much better, how developers deserve in 2020.
